body.name: SAOVERE Womens V Neck Button Down Linen Shirts Long Sleeve Blouses Roll Up Casual Work Plain Solid Tops
features: 【FABRIC】- 80% Cotton + 20% Linen.Fabric has no stretch.Please Note: If you like LOOSE FIT, please choose ONE SIZE UP. Womens long sleeve cotton linen shirts, using high-quality skin-friendly, soft, light and breathable fabrics will enhance your wearing experience.

【FEATURES】- Women summer linen button-down shirts. Solid color, long sleeves, V-neck, buttoned, can be rolled up to 3/25 sleeves, stylish high and low hem, womens casual loose top. Please Note: If you like LOOSE FIT, please take ONE SIZE UP

【OCCASION】- The classic design of the basic model makes this shirt timeless.It can be perfectly matched with jeans, casual pants, leggings and all kinds of skirts. Suitable for daily study, work, vacation or party, to help you easily create the perfect casual look.
【PRECISE SIZE, MULTIPLE COLORS】- The hottest fashion button up blouse has a variety of sizes and most popular colors to choose from, which is more suitable for your body and more photogenic.
【SAOVERE PROMISE】- SAOVERE prides itself on providing the best customer service for our customers.If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can change or return for any reason.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fabric - 80% Cotton + 20% Linen.Fabric has no stretch.Womens long sleeve cotton linen shirts, using high-quality skin-friendly, soft, light and breathable fabrics will enhance your wearing experience. Features - Women summer solid color button-down shirt. Solid color, long sleeves, V-neck, buttoned, can be rolled up to 3/4 sleeves, stylish high and low hem, casual loose women's top. Size - S,M,L,XL,XXL Color - White, Black, Sky Blue, Beige, Army Green, Pink, Light Pink, Mint Green

Product Details Diaplay Linen Material The linen fabric has good air permeability, comfort and skin feel. It is cool to wear in summer and keeps warm in winter. V Neck The V-neck design can modify the face and neck lines. It looks simple and elegant, suitable for work and shopping. High and Low Hem Design The use of fashionable high and low hem design can increase the sense of lazy atmosphere and more tolerant of the figure. Long Slevees Cuffed sleeve with roll tap can be 3/4 sleeve,it can meet your wearing needs under different temperatures, and at the same time dressing is more advanced.

Note - If you like LOOSE FIT, please choose ONE SIZE UP 1.Please check the size carefully before purchase. 2.Please allow 1-2 cm size difference due to manual measurement. 3.The colors may slightly vary from the picture due to lighting effects and monitor settings. 4.Due to the special fabric of our products, wrinkles on the clothes are normal. After ironing, you can get the same effect as the model picture.

SAOVERE Womens V Neck Button Down Linen Shirts Long Roll Up Sleeve Blouses Casual Work Plain Solid Tops Q&A Part Q:Whats the fabric made out of? Is it the linen and cotton in the description? A:The tag says it's 20% Linen and 80% Cotton . Very soft to the touch, good overall. Q:Does the white tops can you see through?Is the white see through? A:It is not see through but but we recommend wearing a nude or light-colored bra or underwear. Q:Will it wrinkle or shrink after washed? A:Due to the special nature of our shirt fabric, slight wrinkles are inevitable, we recommend ironing with an iron before wearing. We have done pre-shrinking treatment during production, so it will not shrink after washing. Q:Can the clothes be machine washed? A:It is recommended to wash by hand, dry in the shade, and prohibit bleaching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic button up
reviews.reviewText: Better than expected I ordered a large and it fits well. The material was not flimsy and paired with jeans gives a nice look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars But a size up!
reviews.reviewText: I am 5' 4" and 120 lbs and a small usually fits well. This one I bought in medium. The arms are a bit short and so is the body length. But it fits well.So kids, if you are a small, buy a medium instead!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cover up when wearing a tank top or tube top
reviews.reviewText: This the the exact cover up that I needed in my closet. It feels good, washes good, looks good and the $$$ is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overall cheap looking blouse.
reviews.reviewText: Cheap looking and runs small. The blouse is also very short.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the material, great quality, true size and love the way it feels. It looks beautiful, can wear it as casual or formal attire. Need to get me other colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT as pictured. Short, for very short, petite people, crop length.
reviews.reviewText: I'm accustomed to ordering up and the small Asian size charts, so I ordered up 2 sizes.I normally wear a Large and I ordered an XXL.This "fits" ok: I can button it, it's not popping tight around bust, but it is NOT oversized as shown on the model.I wanted an affordable linen (natural fiber) breezy shirt to wear to the beach and casual tropical locales. The fabric is comparably heavy, thick: cotton/linen blend (or so the tag claims) for a shirt/blouse; not light and breezy summer fabric. Super wrinkly-- as to be expected from the natural fibers. Just wish the fabric was lighter.Worst: the sleeves are too short, barely reach my wrist and the bottom of the shirt barely covers my waistband. If I tuck it in, I have only 2" of fabric to tuck (pulled taught) and then it comes untucked as soon as I move.SUPER unflattering.I know this is a CHEAP blouse, but save your money.I ordered the blue color and it very close to as-pictured. Pretty blue. If you're a petite XS person and want to order the XXL, and don't mind the heavy fabric, you might like it?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Finally a decent shirt. Looks like a good quality cotton and linen blend fabric. Ordered a size up as I like it loose. Fabric feels a bit rigid but it will probably be softer after washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and stylish-
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Small and Medium thinking there is a big difference. I kept them both! The small is 1 inch narrower - and when I wear the medium, there is not really a big difference. They are both loose and comfy. Nice material - not too thin - but I would use it to avoid the sun and mosquitos. I am 128lbs 5.4ft - and I like my clothes with a little room. But in this case, if someone asks, I would keep the small one. I like them so much that I bought all the colors in both sizes - Small and Medium. Just in case!!
